description: A chocolate hazelnutty cheesecake with a crunchy base that you don't need to unwrap to enjoy.
name: Delicious Chocolate Hazelnut Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the base by combining the biscuits, crushed hazelnuts and butter.
Transfer this to the base of your cake tin and push down hard. Put into the fridge while you arrange the rest of ingredients.
Once melted, add the rest of the ingredients apart from the rocher sweets and once combined fully. Empty the contents into a 10in cake tin.
In a large pot, melt the chocolate with the cream. Place the broken rochers on top of the cake and allow to set in the firdge for up to 4 hours before serving.
